release_notes:
- NEW: Custom Graphics Profiles - Save and apply your configurations
- NEW: Scheduled Cache Clearing - Auto-clear on startup or schedule
- NEW: Interactive tooltips on all buttons for helpful guidance
- NEW: Window remembers size and position between sessions
- Enhanced Graphics Editor with integrated profiles
- Improved dark mode with Windows title bar theming
- Dynamic banner resizing with size constraints
- Custom application icon
- Profile deletion requires confirmation
- Streamlined interface with focused features
